name: SUPER LOVE
description:
This interactive experience is an honest exploration into Zack's personal philosophies, for their BFA Capstone Project @ Cornish College of the Arts in Seattle, WA.

If you download SUPER LOVE, you are strongly encouraged to please leave a comment about your reactions!

CONTROLS:

Left and Right Arrow Keys to move, 

Up: Make Hearts/Feel Feels

Down: Make Broken Hearts/Feel Feels

Space: Jump (Double Jump)

R: Reset Game

Thanks for even looking at this page! Wow! What're the odds even, I mean, really.

<3 ~*

-Z
